post.body: John made pancakes this morn. When he learned I was staying in last nite, he came by.
...or I'm just sick, bc it's 68 or so inside here...
Hm. Well, is warm inside, at leas. And no heater on.
not in here. But then again, am also 30miles south of you...
Am in tank-top and undies, with fan on. God bless southern Louisiana, bc no one else will...
"Voluble" (adj.) Fond of talking.
"jenny" is on repeat in my head. And i want a bottle meself -- several bottles of alch and pills.
"Bubblegum Crisis" questions that too.
Sam's such a good boy...
Haha, I can only imagine Sam's reaction. :D
send sam my way, then...
who was Sam's santa?
is fine. I "@DeanTheCollie" earlier when i meant you. XDDDD
...what was my question? I've forgotten...
Hm. Well, is warm inside, at leas. And no heater on.
Let's do, and say we didn't.
"listen to the movment of your body, / how it keeps On despite You / and it frightens You."
is such a n3rd
now understands her appeal to "BGC 2040"
is considering taking a little Nyquil and calling it a Day.... Ugh. Sick sucks.
